item.title: Supreme Spring/Summer 2022 Lookbook
item.dc:creator: favology
item.description:
Just after releasing a sneak peek, Supreme has returned to showcase the lookbook for its next Spring/Summer 2022 collection. The latest seasonal collection is evoked with a basic lookbook featuring Sean Pablo, Mathias Sauvageon, and Tyshawn Jones. The season’s choices are dominated by a striking combination of designs, prints, embroidery, and badge applications. As usual, […]

The post Supreme Spring/Summer 2022 Lookbook appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Just after releasing a sneak peek, Supreme has returned to showcase the lookbook for its next Spring/Summer 2022 collection.

The latest seasonal collection is evoked with a basic lookbook featuring Sean Pablo, Mathias Sauvageon, and Tyshawn Jones. The season’s choices are dominated by a striking combination of designs, prints, embroidery, and badge applications. As usual, references come from all corners of the globe, led by an unmistakably New York perspective. Aside from artistic references, motifs are taken from photographers, contemporary artists, movies and animations, as well as sporting takes.

The SS22 collection includes a leather GORE-TEX Jacket, B.B. Simon Puffer Jacket, Jeans and Dog Collar and Leash, as well as a The Silver Surfer artwork on a Leather Jacket, Shirt, and Castelli cycling gear. Denim Jacket and Pants from photographer Daido Moriyama’s work, Coaches Jacket and Jersey with scenes from Harmony Korine’s Gummo, and pieces with artwork from Aeon Flux are some of the artful displays.

This season’s aesthetic emphasis is definitely on art, which is represented by designs embellished with Ralph Steadman and AOI artwork, chain stitch embroidery work by Raúl De Nieves on a Denim Jacket and Pants, and top featuring a photograph of Dash Snow by Alain Levitt.

A shirt with an image of Lil’ Kim and an Al Green Photo T-shirt with a matching Skateboard are among the latest interests for The New York imprint.

The SS22 collection from Supreme will continue to have its weekly drops, with the first edition set to debut on February 17 in the United States and Japan on February 19. You can buy Supreme from Streetwear Official.

The post Supreme Spring/Summer 2022 Lookbook appeared first on Favology.

item.title: First Look At The Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX “Light Curry”
item.dc:creator: favology
item.description:
Building on the introduction of the Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX, Jordan Brand is now gearing up to deliver a “Light Curry” colorway of the rugged take on the classic. The upcoming release, centered around a combination of “Light Curry/Cardinal Red/Sail/Black,” will feature waterproof GORE-TEX uppers paired with textiles and nubuck overlays. Detailing comes in the form of […]

The post First Look At The Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX “Light Curry” appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Building on the introduction of the Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX, Jordan Brand is now gearing up to deliver a “Light Curry” colorway of the rugged take on the classic.

The upcoming release, centered around a combination of “Light Curry/Cardinal Red/Sail/Black,” will feature waterproof GORE-TEX uppers paired with textiles and nubuck overlays. Detailing comes in the form of 3M reflective Swooshes, “NIKE AIR” tongue tags, Wings motifs at the collar, GORE-TEX logos at the lateral heel regions and printed insoles. Off-white-colored midsoles and contrasting rubber outsoles with translucent black areas complete the shoe’s design.

The Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX “Light Curry” is expected to arrive in the spring at a price of $200 USD.

The post First Look At The Air Jordan 1 Element GORE-TEX “Light Curry” appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Air Jordan 4 “Blank Canvas” Is Styled With Colorful Paint Blobs on the Soles
item.dc:creator: favology
item.description:
In recent years, we’ve seen Jordan Brand apply various motifs and materials to its iconic Air Jordan 4. The silhouette has recently been seen wearing a “Zen Master” tie-dye upper, which pays tribute to Phil Jackson’s distinctive coaching approach. The latter, a clean “Blank Canvas” colorway, has now been officially unveiled via official images. The […]

The post Air Jordan 4 “Blank Canvas” Is Styled With Colorful Paint Blobs on the Soles appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
In recent years, we’ve seen Jordan Brand apply various motifs and materials to its iconic Air Jordan 4. The silhouette has recently been seen wearing a “Zen Master” tie-dye upper, which pays tribute to Phil Jackson’s distinctive coaching approach. The latter, a clean “Blank Canvas” colorway, has now been officially unveiled via official images.

The Off-White x Air Jordan 4 from 2020 and the Aleali May FNF Air Jordan 4 “Veteran’s Day” makeup have some aspects in common. The complete “Sail” palette is similar to Virgil Abloh’s design, but the entire canvas top is comparable to May’s.

The eyelets, Jumpman logos, and interior lining are all accented with a creamy white tone, which provides some contrast. The midsoles split into an off-white mold on the forefoot and a “Sail” piece towards the rear. The topline is clean, but the treading in red, blue, and yellow hues gets a little more playful with fake paint splatters.

On February 22, the Air Jordan 4 “Blank Canvas” will be available as a women’s-only release for $200 USD through Nike and Amazon.

The post Air Jordan 4 “Blank Canvas” Is Styled With Colorful Paint Blobs on the Soles appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Nike Dunk High Gets A Sweet “Chocolate” Makeover
item.dc:creator: favology
item.description:
There’s no doubt that Nike is committed to keeping its popular Dunk model on the market in the future, with a flurry of new versions both collaborative and inline being introduced. The GR category has been extremely active lately when it comes to unveilings, and it’s adding to its 2022 release schedule with an all-new […]

The post Nike Dunk High Gets A Sweet “Chocolate” Makeover appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
There’s no doubt that Nike is committed to keeping its popular Dunk model on the market in the future, with a flurry of new versions both collaborative and inline being introduced. The GR category has been extremely active lately when it comes to unveilings, and it’s adding to its 2022 release schedule with an all-new Nike Dunk High “Chocolate” colorway.

As you can probably gather from its nickname, it is the candy-like hues that do all of the talking on this upcoming iteration. The uppers are made of tumbled leather, which forms the toe boxes, quarters, and collars as well as smooth leather that creates the overlays.

To begin with, the former is dialed to its normal tone, while the latter is spruced up with a somewhat lighter shade of brown. The laces and Swooshes are the features that stand out against the backdrop of white. The palette is practically identical to the midsole section, which is draped in white and the outsoles are prepared with a finish that matches the aforementioned overlays.

These are expected to be available in the Nike Store later this year. They’ll also be available on Nike.com, Amazon.com, and at select retailers such as Foot Locker, Finish Line, and others throughout the United States.

The post Nike Dunk High Gets A Sweet “Chocolate” Makeover appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Official Images Of The Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red”
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
A classic silhouette mixed with a modern flair. The Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red” teaser images first surfaced online in December 2021. Nike has now officially unveiled the silhouette and its release details. Dressed in a White, Light Curry, Cardinal Red, and Cement Grey color scheme. This Air Jordan 3 resembles the Air Jordan 7 […]

The post Official Images Of The Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red” appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
A classic silhouette mixed with a modern flair.

The Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red” teaser images first surfaced online in December 2021. Nike has now officially unveiled the silhouette and its release details.

Dressed in a White, Light Curry, Cardinal Red, and Cement Grey color scheme. This Air Jordan 3 resembles the Air Jordan 7 “Cardinal” last seen in 2011. The shoe features a White leather upper with signature elephant print overlays highlighted with Cardinal Red accents on the eyelets, liner, and portion of the midsole. Other details include a Bronze hue on the Jumpman tongue and bottom eyelets.

Take an official look at the Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red.”

You can expect the Air Jordan 3 ‘Cardinal Red’ to release at select retailers and Nike.com on February 19th, 2022. The retail price is set at $200.

While waiting check out other Air Jordan 3.

1 Air Jordan 3 Retro Pine Green

Check Price on Amazon

2 Jordan Air 3 Retro Cool Grey

Check Price on Amazon

3 Jordan Air 3 Retro Georgetown

Check Price on Amazon

The post Official Images Of The Air Jordan 3 “Cardinal Red” appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Nike LeBron 19 “Valentine’s Day” Colorway Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
LeBron James and Nike is getting into the festive spirit of Valentine’s Day with a new colorway for his signature line. The “Valentine’s Day” edition of the Nike LeBron 19 will be released next week and it has just been revealed. These flirty hoop sneakers have a colorful mix of embellishments and lovers-friendly touches. Although […]

The post Nike LeBron 19 “Valentine’s Day” Colorway Coming Soon appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
LeBron James and Nike is getting into the festive spirit of Valentine’s Day with a new colorway for his signature line. The “Valentine’s Day” edition of the Nike LeBron 19 will be released next week and it has just been revealed.

These flirty hoop sneakers have a colorful mix of embellishments and lovers-friendly touches. Although the majority of the synthetic top is colorless, it is accented with light pink grid patterns throughout. The back end is finished with a pastel orange glass that houses the little Swooshes and is bordered with milky yellow trim. To honor the February 14 festival, the midsole has been split between minty green forefoot parts and hot pink rear molds, and the internal side of the tongues has been embellished with floral motifs.

The Swoosh provides heart-shaped hang tags with an image of Cupid on them and a basketball graphic with an arrow going through it on the throat to further mimic its lovestruck concept. More Cupid-themed motifs can be found on the heels and insoles, with the latter depicting Cupid shooting a basketball into a hoop.

Look out for the kicks’ official photos here and expect these to drop via Nike soon for $200 USD.

While waiting check out the Nike Lebron Witness 5.

1 Nike Lebron Witness 5

Check Price On Amazon

The post Nike LeBron 19 “Valentine’s Day” Colorway Coming Soon appeared first on Favology.

item.title: Spinnaker Piccard Marks Record-Breaking Mariana Trench Dive
item.dc:creator: favology
item.description:
A truly spec’d diving watch from British firm Spinnaker has been launched to commemorate the world’s deepest dive, made in 1960. The name of the Piccard originates from Jacques Piccard, a Swiss scientist and explorer who traveled in 1960 in the Bathyscaphe Trieste to the deepest part of the ocean with US Navy Lieutenant Don […]

The post Spinnaker Piccard Marks Record-Breaking Mariana Trench Dive appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
A truly spec’d diving watch from British firm Spinnaker has been launched to commemorate the world’s deepest dive, made in 1960.

The name of the Piccard originates from Jacques Piccard, a Swiss scientist and explorer who traveled in 1960 in the Bathyscaphe Trieste to the deepest part of the ocean with US Navy Lieutenant Don Walsh.

The Spinnaker’s design is inspired by the Rolex Deep Sea Special, which was strapped to the Bathyscaphe’s hull. The 45mm Spinnaker draws inspiration from the watch with a heavily domed crystal and a thick 21mm caseband.

The larger, stainless steel case has an impressive 550 meters of water resistance, a Helium release valve, and a ceramic bezel insert.

The Spinnaker’s baton-shaped applied indices are filled with Super-LumiNova and feature a lollipop seconds hand that glides around the glide, driven by a Seiko-built TMI automatic NH35 movement.

The Piccard is available in three different colors — blue, green, and black — through Spinnaker for £430 GBP (approximately $580 USD).

The post Spinnaker Piccard Marks Record-Breaking Mariana Trench Dive appeared first on Favology.

item.title: DTLR Are About to Drop the Exclusive New Balance 2002R ‘Masquerade’
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
Over the years, DTLR, a US-based retailer, has developed a close relationship with New Balance and has been known to occasionally surprise us with exclusive colorways of all of our favorite models. They got it right last year with a pair of patriotic 992s, and they’re kicking off 2022 with a brand new NB2002R dubbed […]

The post DTLR Are About to Drop the Exclusive New Balance 2002R ‘Masquerade’ appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
Over the years, DTLR, a US-based retailer, has developed a close relationship with New Balance and has been known to occasionally surprise us with exclusive colorways of all of our favorite models. They got it right last year with a pair of patriotic 992s, and they’re kicking off 2022 with a brand new NB2002R dubbed ‘Masquerade.’

DTLR and NB were inspired this time by “mask mandates that are relatively new to our current, everyday way of life,” emphasizing themes of “versatility and mystery.” The upper is primarily black, with traces of grey at the back, and is constructed of traditional nubuck. Subtle bursts of red, orange, purple, and green are hidden behind the monotonous tones! An extra set of 992 laces will be included with this special 2002R release.

The New Balance 2002R ‘Masquerade’ will be available exclusively at DTLR stores and online from Feb.11

The post DTLR Are About to Drop the Exclusive New Balance 2002R ‘Masquerade’ appeared first on Favology.

item.title: An Official Look At The Sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black Gum”
item.dc:creator: Ahsanul Karim
item.description:
The creative and fashionable mind of Chitose Abe has been entrusted to continue impacting the space with innovative propositions since she introduced her first series of footwear collaborations with Nike in May 2019. The two companies decided to release more products for sneakerheads in 2022, including the sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black/Gum,”. After months of […]

The post An Official Look At The Sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black Gum” appeared first on Favology.
item.content:encoded:
The creative and fashionable mind of Chitose Abe has been entrusted to continue impacting the space with innovative propositions since she introduced her first series of footwear collaborations with Nike in May 2019. The two companies decided to release more products for sneakerheads in 2022, including the sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black/Gum,”.

After months of speculation and leaked images, we’ve finally gotten our hands on official photographs of the highly anticipated sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black/Gum”. This one will be hitting shelves soon, so you better get your hands on these before they sell out again like all of those other times (you know what we mean).

The popular silhouette has been decked out in a stealthy-looking pair that should appeal to anyone who wants something more wearable than most others seen thus far – which is why this particular design by Chitose Abe at her label deserves attention from sneakerheads everywhere.

The unique design of these coveted sneakers is unparalleled and can be yours for an affordable price. Crafted from a variety of fabrics, the upper consists primarily of suede with some canvas thrown into the mix to really make it pop! And because this collaboration between Nike and sacai has been going on since LDWaffle days.

Order at Nike.com.

Along with the “White/Sail” pair, these are expected to be released in the coming months. The price is set to the usual $180 USD.

In the meantime, check out Nike Men’s VaporWaffle DD1875 500 Sacai – Dark Iris available to buy on Amazon.

Check Price on Amazon

The post An Official Look At The Sacai x Nike VaporWaffle “Black Gum” appeared first on Favology.
